column4: could somebody be uber cool and browse to "/usr/share/fonts/truetype/thai" on their ubuntu system and send me their Purisa.ttf, or link me to a super secret download location that has a dl rate greater then 5 kbps
i cant find it on google with a dl speed greater then 5 kbps
use apt-file to find out what package it belongs to, then get it off of packages.ubuntu.com
